author: stefan2
msg: Make sure the svn_fs_t remains valid after calls to svn svn_fs_upgrade.
If we make the creation of cache instances contingent upon the initial
FS format, those instances will not be available after the FS upgrade.
And if those cache instances are mandatory with the new format, we may
(svn_fs_fs__initialize_caches): Always create all cache instances that
are mandatory for some FS format even if
the current format would not need them.

author: stefan2
msg: (svn_fs_fs__rep_chain_length): Document the pool usage / cleanup strategy

author: stefan2
msg: (svn_fs_x__rep_chain_length): The sub-pool is actually an iteration pool
used in a non-standard way.  Rename and
